channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Student Course Evaluations Now Open for Summer 2024 Sessions I, III
item.description: Date: Thursday, August 1, 2024 (all day) - Course evaluations are now open for this year’s Summer I and III sessions. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please complete evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Saturday, August 17.
item.author: Students

item.title: Student Fall ’24/Spring ’25 Parking Permits Available as of August 1
item.description: Student parking permits for the Fall ’24/Spring ’25 semesters will be available for sale beginning Thursday, August 1. Please note that first-year students are not allowed to have a vehicle on campus, and all other students must register and have a valid permit before parking on campus. For additional information, please contact the Parking office by phone at (518) 276-6616 or via email.
item.author: Students

item.title: Class of 2026 Lake George Trip Scheduled for August 3
item.description: Date: Saturday, August 3, 2024 11:00 AM - 7:00 PM - The Class of 2026 Council and The Arch Ambassadors invite current Summer Arch students to join them for a day trip to explore the iconic upstate New York village of Lake George. Registration is required and space is limited, so register now!
item.author: Students

item.title: C+CC to Host Movie Night August 2
item.description: Date: Friday, August 2, 2024 7:30 PM - 9:00 PM - Join a lovable and clumsy panda on an epic adventure as he embraces his destiny as the chosen one to protect his world. With a new villain threatening to disrupt the peace, our hero must team up with his friends and fellow warriors to unlock new powers and save the day. Packed with humor, action, and heart, this animated tale promises fun for all ages!
item.author: Students

item.title: Applications Now Being Accepted for Spring 2025 Resident Assistants
item.description: Student Living and Learning is looking for applicants to join their Spring 2025 staff. Apply now to join their team of leaders on campus and help create a community in your residence hall! Applications will be accepted from August 1 to October 4, 2024; qualified applicants will be required to attend both a group and individual interview in October. To learn more, sign up to attend an information session this Fall!
item.author: Students

item.title: William Gibbons Joins RPI as Dean of Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences
item.description: William Gibbons, Ph.D. will join Rensselaer as the new Dean of the School of Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences (HASS) on August 1. A leading music scholar, Gibbons’ wide-ranging research explores the intersections of the arts, humanities, and technology in contemporary culture, especially in video games. He will help strengthen RPI’s unique, holistic approach to learning and discovery that foregrounds the human and social context of scientific and technological progress.
item.author: Community

item.title: Joint ECSE/COGS Seminar to be Held August 5
item.description: Date: Monday, August 5, 2024 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - Join ECSE and COGS for a seminar titled “Transforming General-Purpose Robots into Trusted Teammates with HARMONIC,” with Dr. Sanjay Oruganti, Post-doctoral Researcher in the Language-Endowed Intelligent Agents (LEIA) Lab in Rensselaer’s Cognitive Science Department.
item.author: Community

item.title: Session to Review Certificates in Analytics, Machine Learning and AI
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 7, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for a session highlighting Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Analytics, Machine Learning and AI. Attendees can expect to learn how data can inform better decisions, and will review an analytic method that can be used regardless of the tools at hand. Please register to attend….
item.author: Community

item.title: Fidelity to Hold Confidential Retirement Consultation Sessions by Phone, Zoom Video Option
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, August 6, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to help you become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
